Title: The myth of lena dunham
Source: Women Do Genre in Film and Television
Abstract: © 2018 Taylor & Francis.One began to be tired of ‘I’. Not but what this ‘I’ was a most respectable ‘I’; honest and logical; as hard as a nut, and polished for centuries by good teaching and good feeding. I respect and admire that ‘I’ from the bottom of my heart. But - here I turned a page or two, looking for something or other - the worst of it is that in the shadow of the letter ‘I’ all is shapeless as mist.
